mapper.select: SELECT b.`uuid` AS tenantUuid, a.`tenant_uuid` AS `database`, `url`, `username`, `password` AS passwordCipher, `driver`, `host`, `port` FROM `datasource` a JOIN `tenant` b ON a.tenant_id = b.id AND b.is_active = 1
SELECT tenant_id as tenantId, `tenant_uuid` AS `tenantUuid`, `url`, `username`, `password` AS passwordCipher, `driver`, `host`, `port` FROM `datasource`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `datasource` (`tenant_id`, `tenant_uuid`, `url`, `username`, `password`, `driver`, `host`, `port`) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{tenantUuid}, #{url}, #{username}, #{passwordCipher}, #{driver}, #{host}, #{port}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `password` = #{passwordCipher}
